thread.content:
Screening 3 2008 movies in one day? More possible than you think!

Now screening the classic "Swing Vote" (2008); follow us on the hashtag #swingvote21

#SwingTheVote #YoullSwingForThis #EarfulOfSwing #VoteOrDieOrSwing #McConaugheyForGov
Hi, I'm Hervey and I'll be commenting on this film #swingvote21
Hi, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on this film #swingvote21
This menu screen is so pleasant, I can't tell if it's playing a selection from that Marshall Tucker song, or if it just sounds like it; it's been left on for the last 40 minutes or so #swingvote21
Loving this menu screen. Might make it a permanent fixture of my living room. #swingvote21
A Kino Lorber joint! Spiritual successor to Convoy (1978). #swingvote21
This movie somehow produces the "soap opera effect" on a correctly-calibrated TV #swingvote21
Kevin Costner has a TV *above* the bed? Interesting configuration. #swingvote21

It's a simple kinetic display, not a TV

He has a book about "rifles" above his bed, though #swingvote21
This is like the opening of Bottle Shock. Majestic helicopter shot. #NoDronesHere #OldSchool #swingvote21
Confirmed that the menu music was indeed the Marshall Tucker song; I wonder what sort of royalties you get for blu-ray menu screens #swingvote21
I haven't seen this aggressive of steering wheel usage on a straight road in any movie made since 1970. #swingvote21
Bass Pro Shops cap is a very specific thing that works well to establish character and place #swingvote21
Bud *hates* voting #swingvote21
It's really funny that this character, who is plausibly a disaffected independent in 2008, is now obviously and recognizably a Trump voter today #swingvote21
REAL GOOD Kelsey Grammar opening shot. And we've got Tucci in the mix. So good. #swingvote21
President Frasier #swingvote21
I like Frasier's agenda. He believes in progress. #swingvote21
Dennis Hopper's character is some sort of wacked-out liberal moonbat #swingvote21
Nathan Lane's character is *famous* for his poor record in running campaigns #swingvote21
The most precocious of kids. #swingvote21
Costner is deeply, comically incompetent, and yet management shows such compassion in giving him a chance; employees have it so easy #swingvote21
Costner's life is bad, and getting worse; clearly nothing, no matter how wacky and improbable, is going to lift him out of this rut #swingvote21
There's not a whole lot to redeem Costner's character at this point. #swingvote21
Costner's daughter going to be sent to federal prison for 30-40 years #swingvote21
Brief little Celtic jam when she's getting out of the polling booth. #swingvote21
She has given up hope in her father (because he didn't vote) #swingvote21
Very comprehensive cameos by television news hosts. #swingvote21
Chris Matthews, Tucker Carlson (on MSNBC!), Larry King, James Carville: the stars are all out tonight! #swingvote21
The signatures match! #nocrime #validvote #swingvote21
Nothing untoward here at all. #swingvote21
Also, did the state election officials enter his home without permission? Is that within their authority? #swingvote21
Yes #swingvote21
Incredible that they've done a complete count by the next day; I mean, we have memories of Florida 2000, we know that this shit drags on #swingvote21
Nathan Lane got to say the word 'schmuck'! #ClassicLaneLines #swingvote21
Costner now doing some picturesque fishing out at the fishin' hole; this is all such absurd nostalgia/minstelry about the pure, authentic rural whites #swingvote21
The news crew guessed what everybody expected: Costner has been asked to do one of those classic "recasts" we all know #swingvote21
Nice Game Boy Advance SP on the swings. #RetroGaming #swingvote21
Nice news set. Very layered lighting and decor. #swingvote21
George Lopez cares so much about doing the damn news #swingvote21
The news crews outside his trailer have built multiple tiers of standing space with railings. #swingvote21
Everything about this movie is pretty much precisely what I'd guess they'd put into it; really incredible how little this surprises or amuses #swingvote21
You're forgetting the excellent Kelsey Grammer intro shot. #swingvote21
Yeah, that was good #swingvote21
We have the Greenleaf Express and Air Force One onsite! #swingvote21
You can't conduct campaign business in the Air Force One conference room. #swingvote21
We are introduced to a painting of Willie Nelson in the background of Costner's living room; clock ticking down to #WillieTime #swingvote21
This is so boring #swingvote21
The in-person cameos begin! The King, Richard Petty. #swingvote21
Damn, this is wild, who knew a movie could be so crazy #swingvote21
Are NASCAR cars street-legal? #swingvote21
When you're courting THE swing vote, anything is de facto legal #swingvote21
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatch_Act_of_1939 #swingvote21
Tucci demanding that Costner remove his cap, this is no way to treat the swing vote #swingvote21
David (Air Force One waiter) is now in violation of the Hatch Act. #swingvote21
Cracking a Bud Light in honor of this Air Force One scene. #MovieDrinks #swingvote21
I'm cracking a Coors Light in honor of this Air Force One scene. #MovieDrinks #swingvote21
Costner's daughter is become disenchanted with the American system of democratic rule #swingvote21
Costner, merely after seeing Willie Nelson on television, starts wildly cackling; this is the most relatable he's been #swingvote21
Costner doesn't even play this as "street smart but not book smart". He just plays it as "all-around dumb". #swingvote21
"Would you like a Bud, Bud?" #ClassicMovieLines #swingvote21
"Yes, sir. We Democrats are one hell of a party." #ClassicMovieLines #swingvote21
Dennis Hopper's character clearly based on Bernie Sanders #swingvote21
If you want to see a generic rural dude played by Kevin Costner have a great time, "Swing Vote" (2008) is the movie for you #swingvote21
The gambit of having the overwhelmed, long-out-of-practice former musician perform Willie Nelson songs in front of a massive crowd somehow worked out. #GoDems #swingvote21
Damn, President Frasier is bad for fish #swingvote21
Damn, President Frasier is great for fish #swingvote21
This is the first time anything interesting is happening in the movie, which is what political blocs will give up, in order to chase short-term gains #swingvote21

Costner's daughter seeing about 15-16 boxes in the back of a truck

"....Wow"

#swingvote21
Nathan Lane, instead of embracing anti-immigrant rhetoric, should have spent time making ads criticizing the lump of labor fallacy that underlies Costner's poor analysis of labor markets #swingvote21
The influx of gifts seems to have induced them to significantly clean up the house. Interesting. #swingvote21
Maybe he was gifted professional cleaning services #swingvote21
Ah, I see they have someone cleaning their house now. Interesting. #swingvote21
Why does she think asking him about the issues is the right interviewing approach? This doesn't seem to be producing good television. #swingvote21
The film has now repeated the bit about the parties rather amusingly changing their stances four times now, with diminishing returns each time; so boring #swingvote21
The children on the playground exploding into clouds of dust was a pretty good visual gag. #swingvote21
I can't wait to analyze this movie in detail for three year.s #swingvote21
"You're ruining America!" #ClassicMovieLines #swingvote21
This movie is delivering, so, so little, but it's at least tolerable; it really makes me appreciate what a terrible experience it was to watch "21" (2008) #swingvote21

Damn, Costner sold out, he's lost his touch

Even Bill Maher is criticizing him, what a blow #swingvote21
It's really incredible how suddenly and artificially it switched into this new storyline (everybody in town hates Costner now), just because it needs to hit its act breaks #swingvote21
There's no scenario where he votes for either of these candidates. Let's just move past it. #swingvote21
Just constantly people cleaning Bud's trailer. Very convenient. #swingvote21
I love how deeply bleak this school's "take your father to work day" has become #swingvote21
Drinking frozen margs with the Prez on the desert airstrip. #LivingTheLife #swingvote21
Genuinely nice vibe, I coulda used more scenes like this #swingvote21
I'm looking forward to this Presidential debate. #swingvote21
Molly must be spending a *fortune* on stamps to answer all this mail. #swingvote21
Sure, let's shift into a bleak depiction of addiction and mental illness, why not; great tonal shift to attempt 95 minutes in #swingvote21
There's so many layers to unpack here. #OnionMovie #swingvote21
The television journalist is now lying. Good career move. #swingvote21
So many cameos. #swingvote21
Very quiet voices from these commentators. #swingvote21
"I wonder what the fonding fathers wood think of this right now, wood they be franning, or wood they be jumping for joy?" -Arianna Huffington #swingvote21
Big product placement for http://you.net #swingvote21
What a speech. What. A. Speech. #swingvote21
So brave of the TV networks to allow Costner to self-flagellate in a rambling manner for twelve minutes instead of starting the debate #swingvote21
Let the candidates talk. #LetTheCandidatesTalk #swingvote21
Is the plan to work through these entire giant sacks of questions? We're going to be here a while. #swingvote21
Bud's wardrobe game has really increased tenfold. #swingvote21
He's regained the love of his daughter, largely because he crammed civics lessons for six hours #swingvote21
WHAT AN ENDING. #swingvote21
It should have been illegal to end the movie that way #swingvote21
What a lazy movie, holy shit #swingvote21
